name: Carbon counting...a holistic approach to sustainable design
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: A masterclass led by Professor Tom Woolley. Organisations are increasingly under pressure to assess their carbon emissions whether it is through carbon reduction performance league tables or corporate social responsibility statements. This workshop will explain the pros and cons of assessing built environment embodied and operational CO2 emissions with a critical look at the best strategies to reduce resource consumption and damage to the environment.
